mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM product_tb a LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_no, product_img_del_fl, min(product_img_no) product_img_no FROM product_img_tb GROUP BY product_no, product_img_del_fl) b ON (a.product_no = b.product_no AND b.product_img_del_fl = 'N') LEFT JOIN (product_cate_tb) c ON (a.product_cate_no = c.product_cate_no) WHERE a.product_no = ${productNo}

SELECT a.product_cate_no, a.product_cate_type, a.product_cate_large, a.product_cate_medium, a.product_cate_small FROM product_cate_tb a WHERE a.product_cate_type = 'L' UNION ALL SELECT a.product_cate_no, a.product_cate_type, a.product_cate_large, a.product_cate_medium, a.product_cate_small FROM product_cate_tb a INNER JOIN (SELECT product_cate_no, product_cate_type, product_cate_large, product_cate_medium, product_cate_small FROM product_cate_tb WHERE product_cate_no = #{productCateNo}) b ON a.product_cate_large = b.product_cate_large AND a.product_cate_type = 'M'
UNION ALL SELECT a.product_cate_no, a.product_cate_type, a.product_cate_large, a.product_cate_medium, a.product_cate_small FROM product_cate_tb a INNER JOIN (SELECT product_cate_no, product_cate_type, product_cate_large, product_cate_medium, product_cate_small FROM product_cate_tb WHERE product_cate_no = #{productCateNo}) b ON a.product_cate_no = b.product_cate_no and a.product_cate_large = b.product_cate_large AND a.product_cate_type = 'S'
mapper.update: MERGE INTO product_tb p USING dual ON (p.product_no = #{productNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET product_cate_no = #{productCateNo}, product_name = #{productName}, product_deal_area = #{productDealArea}, product_used_st = #{productUsedSt}, product_exch_st = #{productExchSt}, product_free_shipping_st = #{productFreeShippingSt}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_info = #{productInfo}, product_tag = #{productTag}, product_qty = #{productQty}, product_edit_dt = SYSDATE
